divs: Sighting Details1. i was on phone to wifefrom pryory rd in knightswood and saw a stream of lights going across the sky it looked like fireworks but not like a rocket more like a roman candle that fell over and said to her she saw them for the window of our multistory flat and could see them long after i could 2. the sky was clear and it suddenly appeared crossing the sky it did look like a firework at first but there was 7 round objects all moving in a straight line i felt wow i seen something that would be hard to describe and prove but others seen it where i was so that was good i moved out into the street to see where it was going but due to houses lost sight of it and as the buildings were only 1 story high it must have either been quite low or very far away
Summary: seven orange lights flying straighht from sw to west was quite low in sky
trends: There have been 28 other sightings in Glasgow
There were no other sightings in Glasgow on or around September 21st 2012
